headline: 4 Top Artificial Intelligence Stocks to Buy Right Now
summary: Palantir has one of the largest opportunities of any AI company out there.  Nvidia remains well-positioned to benefit from AI infrastructure spending.  Salesforce is looking to become a leader in agentic AI.
